id.description: The unique identifier of the catalog item.

name.description: The name of the catalog item.

description.description: A description of the catalog item.

price.description: The price of the catalog item.

stock.description: The current stock quantity of the catalog item.

storefronts.description: The storefronts that offer the catalog item.

sourceReference.description: The reference to the source material or book where the catalog item is described.

techLevel.description: The tech level of the catalog item.

lawLevel.description: The law level of the catalog item.
